name: z80as
short_description: A Zilog z80 cross assembler for GNU/Linux (and other UNIX like Operating Systems; there is also a Windows Port), written in c language. Supports all z80 instructions, z180 instructions, and even unofficial (not supported by Zilog) z80 instructions .
